title: PR #682: unfortunately doesn't load json with utf-8 correctly

milestone.title: Release 0.3
milestone.description: Various fixes and enhancements as result after OHBM quick agreements

body:
Relates to #682 (decided to file as a separate issue to not get lost among comments)

``` shell
(git)smaug:/mnt/scrap/datalad/datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000052[master]git
$> grep Blagoev .datalad/meta/meta.json
      "Pare-Blagoev, E. J.",
      "Poldrack, R.A., Clark, J., Paré-Blagoev, E.J., Shohamy, D., Creso Moyano, J., Myers, C., Gluck, M.A. (2001). Interactive memory systems in the human brain. Nature, 414(6863):546-50"
```

so there is `é` in `Paré-Blagoev`

```
$> datalad search-datasets BIDS                                                                                                                  
2016-09-03 20:52:19,409 [INFO   ] Next one is slow, but can be made faster by your contribution! (search_datasets.py:67)
2016-09-03 20:52:23,810 [INFO   ] Fast again... (search_datasets.py:70)
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/venv-tests/bin/datalad", line 9, in <module>
    load_entry_point('datalad==0.2.3', 'console_scripts', 'datalad')()
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/cmdline/main.py", line 262, in main
    cmdlineargs.result_renderer(ret, cmdlineargs)
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/metadata/search_datasets.py", line 118, in result_renderer_cmdline
    ', '.join(['{}: {}'.format(k, str(r[k])) for k in r])))
UnicodeEncodeError: 'ascii' codec can't encode character u'\xe9' in position 30: ordinal not in range(128)

$> datalad --dbg search-datasets BIDS
2016-09-03 20:52:38,118 [INFO   ] Next one is slow, but can be made faster by your contribution! (search_datasets.py:67)
2016-09-03 20:52:40,602 [INFO   ] Fast again... (search_datasets.py:70)
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/venv-tests/bin/datalad", line 9, in <module>
    load_entry_point('datalad==0.2.3', 'console_scripts', 'datalad')()
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/cmdline/main.py", line 262, in main
    cmdlineargs.result_renderer(ret, cmdlineargs)
  File "/home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/metadata/search_datasets.py", line 118, in result_renderer_cmdline
    ', '.join(['{}: {}'.format(k, str(r[k])) for k in r])))
UnicodeEncodeError: 'ascii' codec can't encode character u'\xe9' in position 30: ordinal not in range(128)
()
> /home/yoh/proj/datalad/datalad/datalad/metadata/search_datasets.py(118)result_renderer_cmdline()
-> ', '.join(['{}: {}'.format(k, str(r[k])) for k in r])))
(Pdb) p r
{u'name': u'Classification learning and reversal', u'license': u'PDDL', u'author': [u'Poldrack, R.A.', u'Clark, J.', u'Pare-Blagoev, E. J.', u'Shohamy, D.', u'Creso Moyano, J.', u'Myers, C.', u'Gluck, M'], u'type': u'Dataset', u'citation': u'Poldrack, R.A., Clark, J., Par\xe9-Blagoev, E.J., Shohamy, D., Creso Moyano, J., Myers, C., Gluck, M.A. (2001). Interactive memory systems in the human brain. Nature, 414(6863):546-50', u'dc:conformsTo': u'BIDS 1.0.0rc3', u'id': u'4f9efb3a-7173-11e6-a924-002590f97d84'}
```

so it seems it wasn't even loaded correctly (line is marked as unicode but feels like it wasn't decoded from utf-8)

As a workaround (just to proceed) I will submit a PR swallowing upon those problematic ones
